item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (47 points | 2 comments)
2. Getting hit by lightning is good for some tropical trees (73 points | 25 comments)
3. Cross-Platform P2P Wi-Fi: How the EU Killed AWDL (86 points | 40 comments)

7. How to Write Blog Posts That Developers Read · Refactoring English (92 points | 36 comments)

10. The Biology of B-Movie Monsters (2003) (25 points | 18 comments)

12. Preschoolers can reason better than we think, study suggests (141 points | 110 comments)

14. Giant, fungus-like organism may be a completely unknown branch of life (228 points | 95 comments)
15. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff Engineers in NYC ( | hide)

19. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (312 points | 89 comments)
20. Show HN: Cursor IDE now remembers your coding prefs using MCP (10 points | 3 comments)
21. Let's Take a Look at JEP 483: Ahead-of-Time Class Loading and Linking (30 points | 15 comments)
22. Moiré Than Meets the Eye: Uncovering the Quantum Potential of Phasons (3 points | discuss)
23. Japanese scientists create new plastic that dissolves in saltwater overnight (47 points | 18 comments)
24. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (480 points | 211 comments)
25. Entropy Attacks (45 points | 12 comments)
26. 7.7 magnitude earthquake hits Southeast Asia, affecting Myanmar and Thailand (189 points | 60 comments)
27. Building Node.js on Windows with Clang-cl (3 points | 1 comment)
28. The Great Chatbot Debate (10 points | 3 comments)
29. How I Choose What to Work On (2023) (75 points | 24 comments)
